attributes.action: Stop Liz Truss from preventing the essential treatment of transgender children.
attributes.additional_details: If the aforementioned measures are put in place, they could and will have harmful and most likely deadly affects on many transgender yound adults and children. In most cases, the treatment she intends to ban is completely necessary so to preserve the mental and physical health of young adults and children who experience gender dysphoria
attributes.background: The Right Honourable Elizabeth Truss MP, who is the Secretary of State for International Trade and Minister for Women and Equalities plans to ban transgender young adults and children from getting the essential treatment they need. I propose that these measures should not be put in place.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not ban gender transition treatments for under 18s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318025

Uphold current legal protections for transgender individuals and under 18s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318175
